Name: Destiny of Light
About the game: On an epic journey searching for lost past, our heroes will find a future shaken by diabolical plans that are unfolding hidden in shadows of underworld, where your mission will be to guide them to Destiny of Light. Play with two brothers an incredible adventure in a fantasy world, surrounded by malevolent creatures and demons that will try to stop them in their journey of the discovering their skills and virtues. Your quest will begin with the loss of all loved ones, destroyed by an attack of demons. Uncover and choose your skills that will help you in your adventure. You will be able to: - Define the classes of your heroes - Choose the crafts you will have - Assemble a group of the followers to assist you in your missions - Have multiple skills to defeat your enemies - Unraveling intriguing mysteries - Discover the mysteries hidden on the map - Complete all achievements
